meta.name: David Hartsough
meta.description: David Hartsough is a happy human who loves discussing the philosophy and psychology of flourishing, connectedness, and identity.

missions.contribution: outline the fundamentals of fostering flourishing
missions.impact: establish the foundation of humanity's decision-making on the fulfilment of its needs
address the neglected problem of loneliness

missions.contribution: create a community culture that celebrates curiosity, lifelong learning, and personal passion projects

mission.contribution: create a web app and Android app that provides people with 20 of life's biggest questions
mission.impact: cultivate meaningful conversations, moments of reflection, and deeper understandings of the thoughts that define our perspectives

mission.contribution: create a web app that sends people daily prompts of practical and universal ways to have a positive impact
mission.impact: empower people with ideas on how to make a difference in the lives of others through everyday expressions of love

mission.contribution: create a web app that sequentially displays photospheres from randomly chosen coordinates on Earth
mission.impact: give people both a deep sense of wanderlust and an appreciation for the diversity of this wonderful world

mission.contribution: create a web app that provides a social cartography platform for people to mark, visit, and rate specific locations with granular coordinates
mission.impact: encourage people to explore the most beautiful places nearby

mission.contribution: create a web app that provides people with a place to create a thorough and in-depth autobiography
mission.impact: encourage people to outline their lives and define themselves through the practice of introspection and self-examination

mission.contribution: create a web app that encourages people to ask big questions and explore all answers
mission.impact: aid people in the exploration of their perspectives on life

mission.contribution: create a web app that provides people with a place to write down 3 things that went well and why they went well every day
mission.impact: encourage people to practice positivity through a proven gratitude exercise created by positive psychologists
